titleStmt.title: The Lord Bruce and the Lady Elizabeth Bruce his wife, desire a bill may be passed in Parliament, relating no manner of way to the cutting off entails, nor the selling of land, nor the least to the prejudice of their children, nor any other reversions, as by the Bill appears.
titleStmt.author: Elgin, Thomas Bruce, Earl of, 1655?-1741.

titleStmt.title: The Lord Bruce and the Lady Elizabeth Bruce his wife, desire a bill may be passed in Parliament, relating no manner of way to the cutting off entails, nor the selling of land, nor the least to the prejudice of their children, nor any other reversions, as by the Bill appears.
